longDescription:
- Light-gray leather
- Snap fastenings through double-breasted front 
- 100% leather (Lamb); lining1: 68% acetate, 32% polyester; lining2: 92% viscose, 8% elastane
- Specialist clean
- Designer color: Mustique
name: Double-breasted leather jacket
sizeFit:
- Fits true to size, take your normal size
- Cut for a slightly loose fit
- Mid-weight, non-stretchy leather 
- Those with a petite frame may wish to take the next size down
- Model is 177cm/ 5'10" and is wearing a FR size 36
editorsComments:
Lanvin's military-inspired jacket is made in Italy from buttery light-gray leather. This fully-lined piece falls just below your hip and has sharp, epaulette-detailed shoulders. Complement the brushed gold hardware with tonal jewelry.

Shown here with: [Lanvin Sandals id503492], [Chloé Top id408164], [Lanvin Pants id504454], [Larsson & Jennings Watch id521301], [Aurélie Bidermann Necklace id513495], [Maria Black Ring id539019], [Arme De L'Amour Ring id491257], [Arme De L'Amour Bracelets id491245].
